comments.body: I see two problems here1. You have a 4GB graphic card which is bad for crypto mining now unless you choose a brand new coin or you go for Ethereum Classic mining.2. 4GB or Not, you can't solo mine with a single GPU, it will take like forever to solve a block with just one graphic card.Connect your gpu to pool and mine.
